name: COLD, NOT ALONE
description:
You are not alone, fix the radio to leave this cold hell

Small game i did in less than a week to try out this idea.

Controls: i made this originally for the oculus, its a Little buggy for pc
W,A,S,D: Move
Mouse:Look
Space bar: Turn on/off light/ Enter
Escape: Pause

Pay attention to the sounds, and play it fullscreen !
